description:
Nami and the others finally find Brook in the mirror dimension - but he`s in the most inopportune of places! Can they challenge the sleeping Mama and rescue their friend? Meanwhile, Luffy is waylaid on his way back to the rendezvous!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Mom wälzt sich im Schlaf! – Die Brook-Rettungsaktion!
La trahison du Yonkou. Le plan de sauvetage de Brook !
The Emperor Rolls Over! Rescue Brook Mission!
Yonkou no Negaeri: Brook Kyuushutsu Daisakusen!
Ворочающаяся йонко! Операция по спасению Брука!
四皇の寝返り ブルック救出大作戦!
